name: The Second
description:
This game was made for Wowie 4.0 game jam. The theme is "Collaborate With AI".

Gameplay

This is a small platformer where you should follow AI and not let both of you die.

Assets

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/chiptunes/npc-theme/
